org.mmbase.module.smtp

Class CloudMailHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mmbase.module.smtp.CloudMailHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MailHandler

    public class CloudMailHandler
extends Object
implements MailHandler
    This MailHandler dispatched the received Mail Message to MMBase objects. This makes it possible to implement web-mail.
    Version:
    $Id$

      • addMailbox

        public MailHandler.MailBoxStatus addMailbox(String user,
                                            String domain)
        This method returns a Node to which the email should be related. This node can be the user object represented by the given string parameter, or it can be another object that is related to this user. This behaviour is defined in the config file for this module.
        Specified by:
        addMailbox in interface MailHandler
        Returns:
        whether or not this succeeded
